title: Why is the buying area still broken?
body:
I'm curious to know why the buying area for the store is still so broken even after the Summoner's Rift Visual Update has been completed?

* [Horrible outline of buying area](http://i.imgur.com/gwMhCZp.jpg)
* [In-game screenshots of buying area](http://imgur.com/a/OZ82H#0)


P.S. Then again there's also the issue with the bottom and top lane bushes being larger than they look. 
P.S.S Heck I even got trapped against a flat wall by a Master Yi earlier today.

replies.body: You may be out that fat but can you actually buy a thing? I can be next to the inhibitor and open the shop and the buy buttons will be highlighted but I can't actually buy anything unless I am standing in the fountain.

The screenshots are the furthest points in which you can buy from the store.
You should be able to buy from anywhere near the back of the Nexus on blue side.
If your button becomes highlighted then you are **definitely** able to buy in that area.

> You may be out that fat but can you actually buy a thing? I can be next to the inhibitor and open the shop and the buy buttons will be highlighted but I can't actually buy anything unless I am standing in the fountain.

i can buy in almost every spot the buy icon highlights...not sure why you cant.

also, want like...any streamer, tons of them sit REALLY far out and still buy.
thats...wow i did not know the bot side shop went out THAT far...and ive played since beta, lel

The shop circle is around the shopkeeper not the fountain which is why one side can go out further than the other, this isn't broken at all, its logic, when you want to buy you should be closer to the shopkeeper not the fountain, the fountain has nothin to do wih the shop.

Not broken and working as intended like it has since beta, now stop complaining over nothing.

**Item Shop Buying Range**
*You can now only buy items if you're on the physical platform.*

"The space you could buy items on Summoner's Rift was always a bit odd (slightly oblong in favor of top lane), so we decided to have a CLARITY! intervention and re-did the boundaries. We do realize this is a small nerf to specific top lane starts that wait in base for extra gold before walking out with the minion wave, but it's something we've always wanted to do. So we did it."

THERE IS NO FREE SHIPPING: The shop purchasing area is now restricted to the physical platform.
